text: {| |} The Boston Whaler-class lifeboat was part of the A class of lifeboats formerly operated by the Royal National Lifeboat Institution of the United Kingdom and Ireland. It was replaced by the Atlantic 21. ==Fleet== {|class="wikitable" ! Op. No. ! Name ! Built ! In service ! Station |- | A-513 | Sam and Iris Coles | 1985 | 1985–1995 | |} ==References== ==External links== *RNLI Fleet Category:Royal National Lifeboat Institution lifeboats
title: Boston Whaler-class lifeboat
